**The award-winning cruise through the Whitsunday Islands**

Cruise in air-conditioned comfort on a catamaran complete with modern facilities including a rooftop deck and capped numbers to ensure maximum guest comfort.
Perfect for adventure seekers, nature lovers, families, and couples – this full-day tour brings you the best of the Whitsunday Islands in comfort and style.
Ecotourism Australia Advanced ECO certification SeaLink Whitsundays has been awarded Ecotourism Australia’s Advanced ECO Certification as an exemplary operator in terms of sustainability and provision of authentic, high-quality nature-based tourism experiences. SeaLink Whitsundays has been awarded Ecotourism Australia’s Advanced ECO Certification as an exemplary operator in terms of sustainability and provision of authentic, high-quality nature-based tourism experiences.
Ecotourism Australia Advanced ECO certification
Ecotourism Australia
Advanced ECO certification
SeaLink Whitsundays has been awarded Ecotourism Australia’s Advanced ECO Certification as an exemplary operator in terms of sustainability and provision of authentic, high-quality nature-based tourism experiences.

**Inclusions**

• Buffet lunch, morning and afternoon tea served on board in air-conditioned comfort
• Rooftop observation deck providing 360-degree views of the Whitsunday Islands
• Full bar service throughout the duration of the tour
• Complimentary bus pick-up and drop-off service from multiple transfer points.
Tour Details
Leaving Tongue Point, you will cruise across Whitehaven Bay to visit the famous Whitehaven Beach. Any tour of the Whitsundays wouldn't be complete without taking a dip in the beautiful clear waters or just relaxing on the powder-white silica sand on Whitehaven Beach. With up to 2 hours at Whitehaven Beach, you can enjoy a leisurely stroll along the beach, basking in the water, or walking up to the lookout.
The tour departs from Whitehaven Beach as you cruise back through the Whitsunday Islands, completing the circumnavigation of Whitsunday Island and returning to Shute Harbour at approximately 5:00pm.
This tour runs daily (excluding Christmas Day) and includes a complimentary bus pick-up and drop-off service from multiple transfer points. Enjoy morning tea, lunch, and afternoon tea with the convenience of an onboard bar to purchase beverages throughout the duration of the tour.
• Passengers Travelling from 1 April 2025 to 31 March 2026 Adult $245 Concession* $220.50 Child (5-14 years inclusive) $139 Infant (0-4 years inclusive) $0 *Valid Australian Seniors Concessionaire ID must be presented at check-in or full fare will be charged.
